title: Five-Star Portuguese Luxury in the Heart of Madeira’s Capital
description: Experience Madeira - an island off the coast of Portugal - with a stay at the five-star Vidamar Resort, located in the lively capital of Funchal. With a clifftop setting overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, it’s the ideal place to unwind. Included is a complimentary Superior Room upgrade, daily breakfast, nightly dinner, access to the on-site spa, a welcome bottle of wine and a leisurely late 3pm check-out.
